featured.text: Recently, however, the International Olive Council (IOC) is seeking input on test methods to improve the transparency of the testing process and boost the accuracy of the results.

definition.zh_def: 透明度；清晰度，指事物的明晰程度或可見性。
definition.en_def: The quality of being transparent; the clarity or openness of information or processes.
definition.example: The company values transparency in its financial reporting.
